title: Anomalous roton-induced drag on negative ions in He II.
abstract: Measurements have been made of the drift velocities v of negative ions moving through pressurized He II as a function of electric field E. In the roton-dominated temperature range the effective mobility mu = v/E is found to increase with increasing E
